constituent: semi-, water, water droplets, water pistol, turkey, ten, needle
heisigStory: Think of this in terms of the semifinals of some sports competition. Water . . . turkeys . . . needle.
koohiiStory1: The anhinga, or water turkey, has a needle-like nose, so really it´s only a semi-turkey http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anhinga.
koohiiStory2: At the turkey fighting semi-final, turkeys are injected with drugs via needles and splashed with water to help them last the match.
kunYomi: じゅん.じる、じゅん.ずる、なぞら.える、のり、ひと.しい、みずもり
myStory: nửa. tương ứng. phù hợp. mười cái một nửa cũng ra phù hợp
words: local express (train slower than an express)
to follow, to conform, to apply to
to apply correspondingly, to correspond to, to be proportionate to, to conform to
